subject: Re: SIMSONN SQ pro shifter
description_text:
Do you have the shipping address? Sent from my iPhone On Sep 29, 2025, at 7:54 AM, Robert Chappell <chappellr1@icloud.com> wrote: ﻿ Order placed June 11, 2025 Order # 113-1557467-6675464 On Sep 28, 2025, at 11:58 PM, General and sales enquiries <service@simsonn.com> wrote: ﻿ 
 Hi, Could you please provide us with your order ID? The picture can't see clearly. We will rreship a new one to you from our US warehouse. 
 
 service@simsonn.com 
 From: Robert Chappell Date: 2025-09-29 10:39 To: service Subject: SIMSONN SQ pro shifter To whom this may concern: 
 
 I ordered the Simsonn SQ Pro Sim Racing Shifter with 13 CM handle through Amazon on June 11th and it was delivered June 18th, 2025. 
 
 The spring to return to center has broken and I’m not sure what is the next step. What is the warranty for this product? I feel like this should have last much longer. 
 Thanks, 
 Robert Chappell 
 
 
 
 Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并至工单 4319。
